mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_info ( code, price, user_no, star_no, status, product_title ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{price}, #{userNo}, #{starNo}, #{status}, #{productTitle} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payment_info WHERE star_no = #{StarNo} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT pi.*, sb.status as star_status FROM payment_info pi JOIN star_board sb ON pi.user_no = sb.user_no WHERE pi.user_no = #{userNo} AND pi.star_no = sb.star_no ORDER BY sb.reg_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_info order by pay_no desc
